inclusion.criterion: Children 3-36 months old seen in the pediatrician offices presenting acute diarrhea
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: lasting less than 48 h are considered eligible for the study
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: body weight/height ratio below the 5th percentile
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: clinical signs of a coexisting severe acute systemic illness (meningitis, sepsis, pneumonia)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: food allergy or other chronic gastrointestinal diseases
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has dizziness and severe diarrhea since yesterday, with profuse watery diarrhea without odor. V. cholerae was seen in dark-field microscopy of a fresh stool specimen.
